name: Shadow Work 4
description:
◎ Sound on for the endless deconstruction

Down in the dirt & the chaos
lay a treasure none could see
It took the Shadow to destroy me
Tearing, ripping, my soul laid bare
Patch me up, patch me up
Oh Shadow you take me there

This series of artworks and poetry by Maia Mellier depicts the shadow work that goes on deep below. Our shadows are like mythical creatures that drive things in our lives. It's the reason to embrace our dark side because then we have access to its direction and power.
